required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate YH003 in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open-label, Phase 1 Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of YH003 in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open-label, dose-escalation study of the study drug YH003 . The study is designed to determine the safety, tolerability and maximum tolerated dose (MTD) or recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) of YH003 in subjects with advanced solid tumors.

primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1 year after the last dosing
primary_outcome.description: The safety will be assessed by monitoring the adverse events (AE) per NCI CTCAE v5.0

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and/or Recommended phase 2 dose (RP2D)
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 1 year after the last dosing
primary_outcome.description: The MTD and/or RP2D will be determined based on the data of safety and tolerability

arm_group.description: All subject will receive YH003 intravenously as single agent every three weeks (Q3W) for up to 1 years, until intolerable toxicity, confirmed disease progression, withdrawal of consent, or Investigator decision, whichever comes first.

intervention.description: All subject will receive YH003 intravenously as single agent every three weeks (Q3W) for up to 1 years, until intolerable toxicity, confirmed disease progression, withdrawal of consent, or Investigator decision, whichever comes first.
